attributes.action: U-turn on role of Minister for Disabled People
attributes.additional_details:
Many individuals rely on the voices of those who are able, now what do we do?
To have our voices heard in society in this day in age is so frigging hard because to some we are just a statistic, well not anymore!

We deserve to be heard and deserve to be seen, who is willing to stand up for those who can't?

I'm proud to be a disabled woman in this ever changing world!!
attributes.background: I want the government to rethink the action of scrapping such an important role of a Minister who has a every individuals back.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653106
